selection_analysis.selection_criteria: Most balanced performance across technical quality, color characteristics, and biological relevance

selected_reference.name: 12.12 Beef Shoulder 3_grid_5x5_r7_c0.jpg
selected_reference.selection_reason: Most balanced candidate with excellent technical quality (89.9%), good color separation (54.8%), and solid biological content (51.6%). Provides optimal trade-off between all evaluation criteria.

rank_1.name: 12.12 Beef Shoulder 2_grid_5x5_r4_c3.jpg
rank_1.reason: Highest overall score but slightly less balanced

rank_2.name: B. Shoulder 1.2_grid_5x5_r1_c0.jpg
rank_2.reason: Purest stain profile (99.0% Eosin) but lower biological diversity
